website_summaries.verdict: A great choice by Wen for holding and styling, and works well when used before a blowout. The one to pick if you want to style and hold your hair with just one product.
pros: Contains plant botanicals that nourish and smell good
The lightweight hold it creates adds volume, and the convenient pump bottle makes it easy to apply the perfect amount
cons: Some complaints of it weighing down thin hair
May be a bit drying for some hair types

customer_reviews.title: The BEST haircare line available
customer_reviews.text: WEN is the best line of haircare bar none! People tell me it’s too expensive compared to other so called quality and clean product lines. My response is this: how much do ppl pay for shirts, pants, shoes, etc? Which they may wear often but not daily. We wear our hair everyday day 24/7 so isn’t it worth the investment? I believe so 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: ncbeachbumintx

customer_reviews.title: friends hate it. i love it
customer_reviews.text: friends hate it. i love it. sort of makes hair seem a bit thicker and almost a bit of stick to it. i have ridiculously fine hair. it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: I love Wen
customer_reviews.text: I love it because it doesn't flatten my hair. it just shines it and smooths it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Thelemaque

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Wen works great for me. I have ear length slightly curly hair. It brings out curl and grey streaks which I like. I need to wash hair less and it still looks good. Not sure if it works for all and I don'the know about short hair but I am a convert. Since I wash less expense is less although product is expensive.
customer_reviews.author: LCT

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. It is pricey but a great product. I have thin hair from chemo drugs and this really works for me. Gives me more body.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. I don't blow dry as I have curly frizzy hair and when used with the cleansing conditioner and the anti-frizz cream along with the revitalizing spray I had great results with air drying my hair with no frizz and it looks better than it has in years!!! Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Bacon

customer_reviews.title: My hair is fine and straight and is professionally colored
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me. Took me forever -and repeatedly watching many infomercials to finally pull the trigger. Made my hair flat, hard to style and very static-y. I ordered the Fig one based on a chart someone had posted - they said this one is for ahem, mature hair. My hair is fine and straight and is professionally colored. The fig scent is not for me at all. And it stays with you unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Primadog

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It is a foam to help hold in my curls when using my curling iron and leaves my hair looking shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Joann P

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Wen product! I have used a Wen styling product in the gel form in the past so I knew I would like this one as well. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: I don't like leave-in products as a rule
customer_reviews.text: The product doesn't work for me. I don't like leave-in products as a rule, but wanted to try it. The results were nothing better than my less costly products. I feel the products are very much over priced for the results that I achieved. Can't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: ... used this same product one other time and really like it. I have thin gray hair and this ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this same product one other time and really like it. I have thin gray hair and this product is lite and helps hold the body in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: DMMM

customer_reviews.title: I love this product so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much! Nothing tames my frizzy curls better. Best of all, I don’t need to blow dry nor use hairspray unless I want more volume.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: No crunchy hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this before direct from Wen, but I just wanted the mousse by itself this time. It smells great, and really tightens up my natural curls and gives body at the same time. And I don’t get the dreaded crunchy curls look!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: My wife's hair looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great, My wife's hair looks amazing and is growing like crazy. Awesome product. so glad it is available on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: luemas Rellim

customer_reviews.title: In love with this product
customer_reviews.text: Execnt product for my curly hair! I’ve been using his for about 2 months now and it leaves my curls very nice
customer_reviews.author: Alexamil

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed but LOVE Wen!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Wen cleansing conditioner and 613. I have the styling cream, straightening serum and the replenishing spray so even though the mousse is expensive I never had a doubt when I ordered it. Not sure if the summer heat got to it or not, but it doesn't foam and it feels slimmy. Would not recommend the mousse.
customer_reviews.author: Sharna L Larson

customer_reviews.title: I love this product and will continue ordering
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and will continue ordering. It is light weight on my hair and has just the right amount of lift.
customer_reviews.author: Irene M. White

customer_reviews.title: Filthy mess
customer_reviews.text: Bottle was sticky, dirty, and damaged. The packaging was clean and unharmed. Therefore the product was stuffed in the package dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Costigan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My hair has become very disobedient with age. This product should tame me!
customer_reviews.author: nettie

customer_reviews.title: I Love Wen and have NOT Lost Any
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Wen for well over 10 yrs with no problem. My hair was very thin and it's thicker after using it. I Love Wen and have NOT Lost Any Hair
customer_reviews.author: Carol B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It makes my hair soft and manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Diana H

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Wen Mousse is light, but gives my thick hair just the right amount of hold. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This product helps my hair grow quickly while keeping it nourished.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product. I've been using it for some time now.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is the lightest mousse I have come across. But it is tough. Strong. Holds great.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is quite expensive, but works well on dry hair and fly away ends.
customer_reviews.author: L. Battistoni

customer_reviews.title: I could not wait to use this great product. Wen has many products but I only ...
customer_reviews.text: I could not wait to use this great product. Wen has many products but I only use this mousse. It's great. I love the way it makes my hair feel. I use it as a wrap lotion
customer_reviews.author: Elsie L. Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: With short hair you only need one shot, otherwise it made my hair feel stuff, but not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: A must try
customer_reviews.text: Great products. Have been using for several years and my hairdresser says my hair is very healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping it would contain oils or even the good long chain fatty acids
customer_reviews.text: Very drying for my hair. I was hoping it would contain oils or even the good long chain fatty acids. but it still is drying for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: L. Molino

customer_reviews.title: Finally ... a product that works!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for about a month, and I'm very happy with the results. All other mousse products dry my hair, but WEN does not, it's soft, yet manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: WEN products will never touch my hair again. It ...
customer_reviews.text: WEN products will never touch my hair again. It was all the way down my back, thick and full. Now it's thin and I had to have it all cut off. Never AGAIN!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: Not very good. Used it with the Sweet Almond Mint Cleansing ...
customer_reviews.text: Not very good. Used it with the Sweet Almond Mint Cleansing Conditioner as suggested. Wouldn't recommend either product.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn M. Dobbs

customer_reviews.title: Make scalp itchy and scaly -
customer_reviews.text: Great for a while, but after a few months of use my scalp, especially around my ears was itchy and scaly. Stopped using it and received a form for class action suit about a month ago - they need to reformulate.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria A. Fernau

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love ths product. It revitalizes your hair on those in-between days for hair washing
customer_reviews.author: Mae Wyrick

customer_reviews.title: I love the Chaz Dean WEN SIXTHIRTEEN® Daily Cleansing Treatment but ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the Chaz Dean WEN SIXTHIRTEEN® Daily Cleansing Treatment but I did not care for this product. It did not seem to be a thick mousse. Maybe I am just too fond of my Paul Mitchel mousse.
customer_reviews.author: S. Champion

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: OMG ! I use it everyday! Love this product, and the smell of it is wonderful ! thank you for having this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: patricia m anthony

product_meta.title: WEN by Chaz Dean Sweet Almond Mint Nourishing Mousse, 7.5 Fl Oz
product_meta.description: Chaz Dean has reinvented the outdated styling mousses of the 1980s. Instead of making hair feel sticky, dry or crunchy, the WEN Nourishing Mousse is a lightweight product that is treatment-based and not only provides more volume and hold; it also nourishes hair with hydrating botanical extracts that are beneficial for all hair types.
